question: please tell me something to read as my husbands has some very bad habits
answer:
QUESTION
i got married about 6 months back but i found that my husband has some very bad habits means lieing, cheating and fraud etc, if i try to make him understand he become mad and start abusing me, please tell something to read that it can change his these bad habits
ANSWER


Share:
Reading Du'aas and Wazifas is not sufficient to change your husband's bad
habits.

You should observe why does he lie, cheat, etc. and plan carefully to change
that. Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'There is no
intelligence equivalent to planning.' You should plan your cause of action
and work towards that diligently. If that is properly carried out, Insha
Allah, it will be successful.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
